dict.string: Raute needs camera access to allow drivers to capture clear photos of delivered packages as proof of delivery. This helps ensure accountability and customer satisfaction.
Raute needs to save delivery photos to your photo library so you can keep records of completed deliveries.
Raute needs access to your photo library to let you select existing photos as proof of delivery if needed.
Raute needs your location while using the app to show delivery routes, track delivery progress, and update order status automatically when you arrive at delivery locations.

Raute needs your location even when the app is in the background to provide real-time delivery tracking, enable efficient route optimization, and automatically update delivery status. This helps fleet managers monitor deliveries and ensures accurate ETAs for customers.
Raute needs your location at all times to provide real-time fleet management, optimize delivery routes, and automatically update delivery status even when the app is running in the background.
